title: Trouble navigating to a comment from the "New Comments" page.
body:
When I click that orange "new" button to read the new posts only,

http://i.imgur.com/aKKoJef.png

then click "Go To Comment" to try to visit one of those comments in the full discussion,

http://i.imgur.com/ej2C0ea.png

I end up with a comment-less version of that thread's OP.

http://i.imgur.com/Yy1PyMv.png

This makes it hard to respond to new posts, since it's not possible to respond directly from the New Comments page. (It's also weird in that "Go To Comment" doesn't actually go to the comment.)

replies.body: Hey — I'll make sure this gets into our logs if it isn't already. Appreciate the steps to recreate, it really helps our devs when it comes to fixing bugs.

Thank you!

I really enjoy the new forums. I can tell you've put a ton of work into them.
Known bug, I think. I believe the temporary fix is to click 'go to comment', then look in the link for "Show=new" and delete that part.
